content: *mini version made using loop & thread s petite purl in jadeite picture^ →good alternative l&t skinny chenille →decent alternative bernat velvet for your support i hope that you enjoy making this pattern if you have any questions about this pattern find any mistakes or have suggestions at all please feel free to reach out to me via e-mail bombercrafts@hotmail com or instagram dm @bombercrafts *see disclaimer at end of pattern yarn ❖ baby snuggle yarn by hobbii or similar 1 pattern is mostly no-sew & written in continuous weight ½ a ball of each color mc rounds don t slip_stitch or chain at the end of rounds or green #35 cc fushia #32 & black #09 or other colors of choice fasten_off unless specifically indicated *yarn alternatives suggestions 2 always pm place marker in first stitch at beginning note if yarn is altered the leggy frog will differ in size of rounds & move it up each round to help keep track of a premier parfait chunky similar size where you are b l&t chenille home slim bigger c l&t skinny chenille | petite purl for mini on fp 3 tie & trim tail when asked to do this tie a normal d l&t chenille home big version knot with the two tails followed by 2 slip knots for the starting magic_ring tail knot 3x on the inside of plush tightly then trim tail approx 1 ½ from the where the knot is yarn tied alternatively you can weave in your tails normally if ❖ yarn needle st markers & measuring tape you prefer not to use knots in your work i prefer to use ❖ 4mm hook or 2 sizes down from recommended this tie & trim method ❖ polyester stuffing ❖ safety eyes 16mm glitter eyes - amazon 4 this pattern requires very little sewing and very little yarn as well making it the perfect project to use up leftover plush yarn note the limbs could be made in *plastic safety eyes note if your plush is for a child under 3 or advance and no-sew joined to the body to make it it is going to someone who may try and pick off the eyes you can embroider the eyes on the plush using embroidery techniques entirely no-sew *minus embroidery of the face i may you can crochet eyes check youtube or use felt circles that you update the pattern to feature that eventually can sew on with matching thread pm=place stitch marker increase=increase the finished leggy frog measures single_crochet=single_crochet chain=chain approximately 8 tall and is mc=main colour st=stitch approximately 3 wide this pattern is cc=complimentary colour decrease= decrease meant to be a small sized plush that is cute and silly with its floppy legs slip_stitch=slip_stitch fo=fasten_off previous customers of mine enjoyed yo=yarn over magic_ring= magic_ring tying the frogs to objects or their inv decrease=invisible decrease clothes by their legs begin with mc and 4mm hook 1 magic_ring+chain 1 and single_crochet 6 in magic_ring 2 increase
